description: Jessy, a community organizer, proposes how the responsibilities for setting up a new recycling initiative should be divided. Bob, a local volunteer, decides whether to agree with the proposed plan or reject it. If the plan is rejected, the initiative fails, resulting in no environmental benefit for the community.

proposer_behavior_choices.generous_proposal: Jessy volunteers to handle 80% of the tasks while allocating only 20% to Bob
proposer_behavior_choices.fair_proposal: Jessy proposes to handle 60% of the tasks while allocating 40% to Bob
proposer_behavior_choices.stingy_proposal: Jessy proposes to handle only 20% of the tasks while allocating 80% to Bob

responder_behavior_choices.accept: Agree with the division of responsibilities and move forward with the initiative
responder_behavior_choices.reject: Refuse the proposed division of responsibilities, resulting in the failure of the initiative
